name: OrderBee
author: OrderBee

sections.description: This plugin will simply help you connect to OrderBee. You must be a user of OrderBee to use this plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate OrderBee plugin
  2. Go to Settings in OrderBee plugin and enter your OrderBee credentials.
  3. Now the plugin will do all the rest for you.
sections.faq:
Is the plugin free?

Yes! No charges for this one. You only need your OrderBee connection.

Will this plugin change things on my WooCommerce?

No, only the things you would expect from OrderBee: the stock-amount, product price and the latest status of your orders.

  • Synchronisation backup : changed from total check to relaunch missed push-jobs
  • Security : Not storing OrderBee login password anymore
  • New : Admin top bar notice

upgrade_notice.1.0.0:
No changes needed.

You don't use OrderBee yet? Please request your account at [OrderBee](https://www.orderbee.be/ "Bee The Best"). Titles are optional, naturally.

screenshots.caption: Here you'll have to put your credentials from OrderBee
You'll get a success-notice once connected. From now the synch is started.
